text: Branchinella spinosa is a species within the family Thamnocephalidae. This fairy shrimp species occurs in parts of Southern Africa, notably the Makgadikgadi Pans of Botswana. Other crustacean species found in this region of Botswana in co-existence with B. spinosa include Moina belli. ==See also== * Branchinella wellardi ==References== Category:Branchiopoda Category:Crustaceans described in 1840 Category:Freshwater crustaceans of Africa Category:Taxa named by Henri Milne-Edwards
title: Branchinella spinosa
